attributes.action: review the no smoking ban in public houses and in private clubs and at football matches also.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i feel like a second class citizen in this country now and realise that this country is no longer a democratic society.i thought the queen was our head of state followed by the church of england.
I have paid income tax in this country for at least 40 years and i think that entitles me to have an opinion.i.m sure there are lots more people that feel like me let down by our own country now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
